pageTitle: Insiders Buy At Opko Health Inc. And Accelerate Diagnostics Inc | Stocks | Minyanville's Wall Street
title: Insider Purchases
textBeforeTable: For more insider trades, please see the chart below: The Grover C. Coors Trust sold 2,896,393 shares of packaging solutions company Graphic Packaging Holding Company (NYSE:GPK) for $22,389,118. At aircraft leasing company Air Lease Corp (NYSE:AL), shareholders Ares Management LLC and Green Equity Investors V LP both sold 3,062,787 shares of company stock, the former for $81,929,552 and the latter for $81,378,248. Notable Sales: Larry Feinberg bought 45,508 shares of infectious pathogen identification and testing company Accelerate Diagnostics Inc (NASDAQ:AXDX) for $379,151. Phillip Frost, the Chairman and CEO of the multinational pharmaceutical and diagnostics company Opko Health Inc. (NYSE:OPK), bought 250,000 shares of company stock for $1,595,960, increasing his total stake in the company to 126,382,048 shares, worth about $827 million. Welcome to our daily roundup of top insider trades. Here's a look at the most significant inside sales and purchases filed with the SEC on Friday, June 7, 2013.
